sentences.sContent: The car needs a complete overhaul.

synos.tran: 分解检查，大修；追上并超过

remMethod.val: over(从头到尾) + haul(拉， 拖) → 全都拉上来进行修理 → 仔细检查

trans.tranCn: 仔细检查； 彻底检修
trans.tranOther: necessary changes or repairs made to a machine or system

trans.tranCn: 仔细检查； 彻底检修
trans.tranOther: to repair or change the necessary parts in a machine, system etc that is not working correctly
